AboutCardjs.activities1: Apart from coding, here are some other activities that I love to do:

Projectsjs.projects3: Here are a few projects I've worked on recently.
Projectsjs.card1Description: This portfolio, which was developed using JavaScript with the React framework, shows modern web development skills with a keen focus on CSS styling and UX, responsive across all device types. It presents detailed personal information, skills, projects, and resume details, all reflecting what I have worked on, continually updating it as I go. Node.js is used for efficient dependency management, and custom components highlight a great approach to an interactive design.
Projectsjs.card2Description: FitFuel, an innovative application, integrates meal and workout planning with AI and robust health app connectivity, facilitating a comprehensive wellness journey. Designed to offer personalized plans, it fills a critical gap in the market by targeting health-conscious users and professionals. It focuses on data security and encourages ongoing feedback to achieve a balanced lifestyle. The planner adapts to individual needs, making health management both accessible and engaging.
Projectsjs.card3Description: This Tic Tac Toe app, built with React, offers a nostalgic experience with its chalkboard background and chalk-like font. Play against a friend or challenge the computer, which uses the Minimax Algorithm to determine the best move, making it tough to beat ('impossible to beat' is more accurate). With easy clicks to place your marks and a scoreboard represented by tallies to keep track, it's a fun way to test your skills. Whether you're playing with friends or alone, it's a great way to pass the time.
